name: Lonely Dusty Company
description:
The world is ending. All life is extinct. A lonely machine roams the ruined surface of the Earth, making what friends they can in an empty world.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • S to interact or talk with inanimate objects
  • Space to carry or drop your friends

Features

  • Talk to your best friends - a coat hanger, an empty can, a wheel, a jerry can, and a dead fly in a jar
  • Probably don't wander an endless desert. It's endless.
  • Use a telescope to make sure the Earth isn't about to be destroyed by an ever expanding sun.
  • But if the worst comes to the worst, there's always a rocket you and your friends can escape on...
  • Fullfil the deepest desires of a tyre
  • Form eternal friendships to last a lifetime

Credit: Game made by Hannah Rose. All graphics, code, and music by Hannah Rose.

Made in Unity.

Font by ShyFonts
